Classes in edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.tasks used by edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.actionselection
LidaTask
          This is the base Interface for all the task process in LIDA.
LidaTaskImpl
          This class implements the LidaTask Interface.
LidaTaskManager
          All tasks in the Lida system are created, executed, and managed by this class.
TaskSpawner
          TaskSpawners create, manage, and end new LidaTasks.
TaskSpawnerImpl
          Implements the TaskSpawner interface.
